channel.title: storm on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in storm on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.5: A weekend in Michigan
item.description: 11th August 2014 Dear family and friends, How are you? Two busy weekends have passed since I last wrote to you.

item.title: The storm
item.description: It is an odd sort of night nearing summer solstice. Outside, everything lights up in flashes as bright as day as the magnificent branches of lightning strike further and further away.
